title: Chapter 4339 - Chapter 4339: 4338, The Second Disciple Who Had Reached The Threshold!
body:
Chapter 4339 - Chapter 4339: 4338, The Second Disciple Who Had Reached The Threshold!

Chapter 4339: 4338, the second disciple who had reached the threshold!

Translator: 549690339

Wang Xian brought them to the location of the Dragon Palace.

Following that, the 12 ancestral sorcerers immediately set up the formation.

Wang Xian took out some relatively precious items to set up the formation.

After that, he did not bother about these matters.

Time passed bit by bit. Wang Xian was in the palace watching the situation of the disciples of the Dragon Palace.

Soon, five million years passed.

On this day, a cold gleam swept across the entire primal chaos stone.

In the surrounding area, a group of disciples of the Dragon Palace opened their eyes and looked at bei Shuang.

“Congratulations, bei Shuang. You have touched the threshold of a breakthrough!”

The group of disciples of the Dragon Palace immediately congratulated her with envy in their eyes!

“Phew!”

Bei Shuang opened her eyes. Her eyes were filled with excitement.

“I’m also relying on the treasure to take the first step. Good luck, everyone!”

Bei Shuang smiled and said to the group of leaders of the disciples from the Dragon Palace.

At the same time, Wang Xian also sensed bei Shuang’s change. A smile appeared on his face.

The disciples from the Dragon Palace were finally the first to complete the breakthrough.

Moreover, it was his own disciple, bei Shuang.

Bei Shuang’s breakthrough did not exceed Wang Xian’s expectations. After all, the energy of that mutated frost gem was indeed terrifying.

It was also very suitable for bei Shuang.

Moreover, once bei Shuang made a breakthrough, as an existence with mutated attributes, his strength was stronger than an expert who had just stepped into the Heaven’s origin creation level.

The reason for the mutation attribute allowed him to be comparable to an expert who had just stepped into the Heaven’s origin creation level with the space attribute.

“That’s right, bei Shuang. Let’s go back to the nine origin universe to make a breakthrough!”

Wang Xian said to her with a smile on his face.

Bei Shuang’s uniqueness allowed him to make a breakthrough directly in the nine origin universe.

This was one of the benefits of the mutation attribute.

“Yes, Master!”

Bei Shuang nodded her head happily.

If one didn’t enter the Heaven Origin Creation Realm, one would eventually face death!

Only by entering the Heaven’s origin would one be able to transcend everything!

Wang Xian called an lie over and brought bei Shuang back to the nine-origin universe!

“Let’s break through!”

They flew out of the Dragon Palace directly. Wang Xian said to bei Shuang with a smile on his face!

“Okay!”

Bei Shuang nodded her head heavily.

“Roar!”

His body moved and he immediately flew to the sky above the Dragon Palace.

When some of the strong disciples in the Dragon Palace saw this, they flew out one after another!

“Lord bei Shuang is about to break through!”

“I didn’t expect our Lord bei Shuang to be the first to break through.”

“With the help of Lord Dragon King, Our Dragon Palace will have more and more heaven origin destiny realm powerhouses.”

When the disciples of the Dragon Palace saw this scene, they revealed excited expressions.

“Dragon King!”

“Xiao Xian!”

At this moment, Linniu Lan Qingyue and the rest also flew over and came to Wang Xian’s side!

“Is bei Shuang about to break through?”

Guan Shuqing looked at bei Shuang who had turned into a frost divine dragon and asked with a twinkle in her eyes.

“Yes, she’s about to break through. All of you must work hard and strive to reach the destiny realm of the Heaven’s origin realm.”

Wang Xian looked at the group of girls and said with a smile!

The group of girls were not as serious in their cultivation as the leaders of the Dragon Palace.

Other than Qing Yue, none of them had reached the peak of the Dominator realm.

However, they had already reached the ninth level of the Dominator realm!

They were not far away from the peak of the Dominator realm.

In the next four to five billion years, they would just have to touch the threshold of breaking through!

Wang Xian believed that he could make them reach this stage!

“Looks like we have to train hard!”

The group of girls said.

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

Bei Shuang raised her head and roared. An endless amount of water energy surged towards them.

The moment it got close to her, it turned into crystals that shimmered under the sunlight.

The terrifying power caused the powerhouses in the nine-origin universe to be shocked!

“HMM? There are powerhouses making a breakthrough? How is this possible? Aren’t the slots in our nine-origin universe used up? In the direction of the Dragon Palace!”

Hetian saint immediately flew out of the palace and looked over after sensing this powerful force.

He hesitated for a moment and directly teleported toward the Dragon Palace through the teleportation array!

Not long after the demon race made a breakthrough, Jiuli, who was in charge of the nine-origin universe, also flew out of the Demon Abyss. His eyes flickered as he directly teleported toward the Dragon Palace!

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

Buzz! Buzz

The two peak races had teleportation arrays that could directly reach the Dragon Palace.

When they teleported over, they immediately saw Northern Frost, who had made his breakthrough in the sky.

“This is? The mutated Divine Dragon, Frost Divine Dragon, the disciple of the Dragon King, a powerhouse with mutated attributes. This is unique in the entire nine-origin universe!”

“No wonder he could achieve a breakthrough.”

When he saw this scene, Saint Hetian’s eyes narrowed as he spoke in shock.

“Congratulations, Dragon King. The Dragon Palace has another powerhouse.”

Saint Hetian immediately flew over and bowed respectfully to Wang Xian.

“Congratulations, Dragon King! Congratulations, Dragon Palace!”

Jiuli also flew over and congratulated Wang Xian respectfully.

Wang Xian nodded at them and looked at bei Shuang.

Bei Shuang’s breakthrough was very smooth.

“Master, I’ve made a breakthrough!”

Bei Shuang had made a breakthrough and flew to Wang Xian with a face full of joy.

“Not bad!”

Wang Xian nodded. “For the next period of time, you should stabilize your cultivation at the Dragon Palace.”

“Yes, Master!”

Bei Shuang nodded her head.

“Congratulations, bei Shuang.”

A group of girls flew over and congratulated bei Shuang.

This made bei Shuang smile in embarrassment.

“Dragon King, do you want to arrange a celebratory feast for Miss bei Shuang?”

Saint he Tian said with a smile from the side.

“Forget it for the time being. The experts from the nine-origin universe are all outside now. We can prepare when we have time.”

Wang Xian shook his head.

After chatting with them for a while, Wang Xian returned to the Dragon Palace.

Although bei Shuang’s breakthrough was not celebrated in the nine-origin universe, it was held in the Dragon Palace!

Wang Xian stayed in the Dragon Palace for some time before returning to the Great Dao of heaven.

Time passed once again.

Another 100,000 years passed. In the primal chaos stone, another 10,000,000 years passed.

On this day, another powerhouse from the Dragon Palace reached the threshold of a breakthrough!

The second person to reach the threshold was Shui Linglong’s father, the leader of the water element in the Dragon Palace.

With the huge amount of resources, the dragon palace began to produce disciples who had reached the shackle!

“Dragon King!”

Shui Linglong’s father, the leader of the Water God Dragon, looked at Wang Xian with excitement and called out respectfully.

“Very good. Wait here for now. I need to find a universe that can help you break through!”

Wang Xian said to him with a smile on his face!

“It’s the Dragon King!”

The leader of the Water Dragon God nodded his head.

Wang Xian took out his heaven’s origin communicator and browsed through it while looking at the messages one by one.

On the Heaven’s origin communicator, the Heaven’s origin creation quota was sold.

Similarly, some universes encountered a crisis and would take out the Tian Yuan creator slot to trade for help.

The backers could even raise this condition!
